source_sentence: 若種姓法是實有，非非有者，則此大乘非尊非勝、非上非妙，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If caste dharmas really exist and aren't nonexistent, then this great vehicle is neither honored nor superior, neither higher nor more marvelous, and can't surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以種姓法非實有，是非有性故，此大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because caste dharmas don't really exist and don't have the nature of non-existence, this great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, surpassing all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 若第八法、預流法、一來法、不還法、阿羅漢法、獨覺法、菩薩法、如來法是實有，非非有者，則此大乘非尊非勝、非上非妙，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the eighth dharma, the prerunning dharma, the once-returner dharma, the nonreturner dharma, the arhat dharma, the solitary realizer dharma, the bodhisattva dharma, and the tathāgata dharma were truly existent and not nonexistent, then this great vehicle would be neither honored nor superior, neither superior nor marvelous, and wouldn't be able to surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以第八法乃至如來法非實有，是非有性故，此大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the eighth dharma and even the tathāgata's dharma don't really exist and aren't existent, this great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, surpassing all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若種姓補特伽羅是實有，非非有者，則此大乘非尊非勝、非上非妙，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If seedy personalities like Potala's really existed and weren't nonexistent, then this great vehicle would be neither honored nor superior, neither superior nor marvelous, and wouldn't be able to surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, sir!

source_sentence: 以種姓補特伽羅非實有，是非有性故，此大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the seedy person Pudgala doesn't really exist and has non-existence, this great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, surpassing all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 若第八、預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢、獨覺、菩薩、如來補特伽羅是實有，非非有者，則此大乘非尊非勝、非上非妙，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the eighth, pre-flow, first-returner, irreversible, arhat, solitary realizer, bodhisattva, and tathāgata-patra were truly existent and not nonexistent, then this great vehicle would be neither honored nor superior, neither superior nor marvelous, and wouldn't be able to surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以第八乃至如來補特伽羅非實有，是非有性故，此大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the eighth and even the Tathāgata's pudgala don't really exist and are nonexistent, this great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, surpassing all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若一切世間天、人、阿素洛等是實有，非非有者，則此大乘非尊非勝、非上非妙，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth truly existed and weren't nonexistent, then this great vehicle would be neither honored nor superior, neither superior nor marvelous, and wouldn't be able to surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以一切世間天、人、阿素洛等非實有，是非有性故，此大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth don't really exist and have non-existence, this great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, surpassing all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩從初發心，乃至安坐妙菩提座，其中所起無量種心是實有，非非有者，則此大乘非尊非勝、非上非妙，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the measureless kinds of mind that arise in a bodhisattva's mind from the time he first arouses the intention until he sits on the marvelous seat of enlightenment are truly existent and not nonexistent, then this great vehicle is neither honored nor superior, neither higher nor more marvelous, and it's not superior to all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以菩薩摩訶薩從初發心，乃至安坐妙菩提座，其中所起無量種心非實有，是非有性故，此大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the measureless kinds of mind that arise in a bodhisattva's mind from the time he first arouses the intention until he sits on the marvelous seat of enlightenment don't really exist and aren't existent in nature, this great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, surpassing all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩金剛喻智是實有，非非有者，則此大乘非尊非勝、非上非妙，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's adamantine wisdom were truly existent and not nonexistent, then this great vehicle would be neither honored nor superior, neither superior nor marvelous, and it wouldn't be able to surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以菩薩摩訶薩金剛喻智非實有，是非有性故，此大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's adamantine wisdom doesn't really exist and isn't existent, this great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, surpassing all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩金剛喻智是實有，非非有者，則菩薩摩訶薩不應用此金剛喻智達一切法自性皆空，永斷一切煩惱習氣相續，證得一切智智，亦不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: "If the bodhisattva's adamantine metaphorical wisdom were truly existent and not nonexistent, then unless the bodhisattva applies this adamantine metaphorical wisdom to realize that the own-natures of all things are empty, permanently eliminate the continuity of all afflictive habits, and attain the wisdom of all things, the bodhisattva wouldn't be able to surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Vairocana!

source_sentence: 以菩薩摩訶薩金剛喻智非實有，是非有性故，諸菩薩摩訶薩用此金剛喻智達一切法自性皆空，永斷一切煩惱習氣相續，證得一切智智，亦能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the bodhisattvas' knowledge of the vajra metaphor doesn't really exist and has the nature of nonexistence, bodhisattvas use this knowledge of the vajra metaphor to realize that the own-natures of all things are empty, permanently end the continuation of all afflictive habits, and attain the knowledge of all things, which also transcends all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若諸如來、應、正等覺三十二大士相、八十隨好所莊嚴身是實有，非非有者，則諸如來、應、正等覺威光妙德，不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the bodies of the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones adorned by the thirty-two marks of a great personage and the eighty minor features were truly existent and not nonexistent, then the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones' awe-inspiring marvelous virtues wouldn't surpass all earthly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Tathāgata!

source_sentence: 以諸如來、應、正等覺三十二大士相、八十隨好所莊嚴身非實有，是非有性故，諸如來、應、正等覺威光妙德超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the bodies adorned by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones' thirty-two great characteristics and eighty minor features don't really exist and aren't existent in nature, the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones' awe-inspiring marvelous virtue transcends all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若諸如來、應、正等覺所放光明是實有，非非有者，則諸如來、應、正等覺所放光明，不能普照十方各如殑伽沙界，亦不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the light radiated by the tathāgatas, arhats, and virtually universal enlightenment were truly existent and not nonexistent, then the light radiated by the tathāgatas, arhats, and virtually universal enlightenment wouldn't be able to universally illuminate the sands of the world in each of the ten directions, nor would it be able to transcend all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以諸如來、應、正等覺所放光明非實有，是非有性故，諸如來、應、正等覺所放光明皆能普照十方各如殑伽沙界，亦能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the light radiated by the tathāgatas, arhats, and virtually all enlightened ones isn't really there and isn't existent, the light radiated by the tathāgatas, arhats, and virtually all enlightened ones can universally illuminate the sands of the world in all ten directions and transcend all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若諸如來、應、正等覺所具六十美妙支音是實有，非非有者，則諸如來、應、正等覺所具六十美妙支音，不能遍告十方無量無數世界所化有情，亦不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the 60 beautiful part sounds that the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones possess really exist and aren't nonexistent, then the 60 beautiful part sounds that the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones possess can't address the sentient beings created in the numberless and incalculable worlds in the ten directions, nor can they surpass all the worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Tathāgata!

source_sentence: 以諸如來、應、正等覺所具六十美妙支音非實有，是非有性故，諸如來、應、正等覺所具六十美妙支音皆能遍告十方無量無數世界所化有情，亦能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the 60 beautiful part sounds that the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones possess aren't really existent and aren't existent in nature, the 60 beautiful part sounds that the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones possess can universally address the sentient beings created in measureless and countless worlds in the ten directions and transcend all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若諸如來、應、正等覺所轉法輪是實有，非非有者，則諸如來、應、正等覺所轉法輪非極清淨，亦非一切世間沙門、婆羅門等所不能轉，亦不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the Dharma wheels turned by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones really existed and weren't nonexistent, then the Dharma wheels turned by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones wouldn't be perfectly pure, wouldn't be turned by all worldly ascetics and priests, and wouldn't surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以諸如來、應、正等覺所轉法輪非實有，是非有性故，諸如來、應、正等覺所轉法輪最極清淨，一切世間沙門、婆羅門等皆無有能如法轉者，亦能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the Dharma wheels turned by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones don't really exist and are non-existent in nature, the Dharma wheels turned by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones are most extremely pure, and there are no ascetics or priests in the world who can turn them according to the teaching, nor are they superior to all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若諸如來、應、正等覺所化有情是實有，非非有者，則諸如來、應、正等覺所轉法輪，不能令彼諸有情類於無餘依妙涅槃界而般涅槃，亦不能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: If the sentient beings created by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones really existed and weren't nonexistent, then the Dharma wheels turned by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones couldn't cause those sentient beings to parinirvāṇa in the element of wonderful nirvāṇa without remainder, nor could they surpass all earthly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 以諸如來、應、正等覺所化有情非實有，是非有性故，諸如來、應、正等覺所轉法輪，皆能令彼諸有情類於無餘依妙涅槃界而般涅槃，亦能超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。
translation: Because the sentient beings created by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones don't really exist and don't have the nature of existence, the turning of the Dharma wheel by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones can cause all those sentient beings to [enter] parinirvāṇa in the element of wonderful nirvāṇa without remainder, and they can surpass all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 由如是等種種因緣故，說大乘是尊是勝、是上是妙，超勝一切世間天、人、阿素洛等。」
translation: Because of these various reasons, it's said that the great vehicle is honored, superior, and marvelous, and it transcends all worldly gods, humans, asuras, and so forth."

source_sentence: 第二分無所有品第二十一之一
translation: Part Two, Chapter Twenty-One, Chapter One, Nothingness

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 汝說『大乘與虛空等。』
translation: You say, 'The great vehicle and space are equal.'

source_sentence: 者，如是！
translation: Thus, it's like this!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 如汝所說。
translation: Just as you said.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 譬如虛空東西南北四維上下一切方分皆不可得，大乘亦爾，東西南北四維上下一切方分皆不可得，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Just as the four directions east and west, north and south, and up and down of space are all inaccessible, so too is the great vehicle, for which all directions east and west, north and south, and up and down of space are inaccessible, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equal.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 又如虛空長短、高下、方圓、邪正一切形色皆不可得，大乘亦爾，長短、高下、方圓、邪正一切形色皆不可得，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as the sky is unknowable in terms of its length, height, squareness, roundness, and right and wrong forms, so too is the great vehicle unknowable in terms of its length, height, squareness, roundness, and right and wrong forms, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equivalent.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 又如虛空青黃赤白紅紫碧綠縹等顯色皆不可得，大乘亦爾，青黃赤白紅紫碧綠縹等顯色皆不可得，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as the blue, yellow, red, white, red, purple, turquoise, and other manifest forms of space are all unobtainable, so too is the great vehicle, for which the blue, yellow, red, white, red, purple, turquoise, and other manifest forms are all unobtainable, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equal.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Well done!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非過去非未來非現在，大乘亦爾，非過去非未來非現在，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space is neither past, nor future, nor present, so too is the great vehicle, which is neither past, nor future, nor present, and so it's said to be equal to space.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Well done!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非增非減、非進非退，大乘亦爾，非增非減、非進非退，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space neither increases nor decreases, and neither advances nor retreats, so too does the great vehicle, which neither increases nor decreases, and neither advances nor retreats, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equal.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非染非淨，大乘亦爾，非染非淨，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space is neither defiled nor pure, so too is the great vehicle, which is neither defiled nor pure, and so it's said to be equal to space.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 又如虛空無生、無滅、無住、無異，大乘亦爾，無生、無滅、無住、無異，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space has no arising, no cessation, no abiding, and no difference, so too does the great vehicle have no arising, no cessation, no abiding, and no difference, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equal.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非善非非善、非有記非無記，大乘亦爾，非善非非善、非有記非無記，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space is neither good nor good, and neither marked nor indeterminate, so too is the great vehicle, which is neither good nor non-good, nor marked nor indeterminate, and so it's said to be equal to space.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 又如虛空無見、無聞、無覺、無知，大乘亦爾，無見、無聞、無覺、無知，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space has no views, no hearing, no awakening, and no knowledge, so too does the great vehicle have no views, no hearing, no awakening, and no knowledge, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equal.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非所知、非所達、非遍知、非永斷、非作證、非修習，大乘亦爾，非所知、非所達、非遍知、非永斷、非作證、非修習，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space is not known, not comprehended, not fully known, not permanently stopped, not realized, and not cultivated, so too is the great vehicle, which is not known, not comprehended, not fully known, not permanently stopped, not realized, and not cultivated, so it's said to be the same as space.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非果非有果法、非異熟非有異熟法，大乘亦爾，非果非有果法、非異熟非有異熟法，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as space is neither fruitful nor existent, and neither ripe nor existent in terms of ripening qualities, so too is the great vehicle, which is neither fruitful nor existent in terms of fruitful qualities, nor ripe nor existent in terms of ripening qualities, so it's said to be equal to space.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非有貪法非離貪法、非有瞋法非離瞋法、非有癡法非離癡法，大乘亦爾，非有貪法非離貪法、非有瞋法非離瞋法、非有癡法非離癡法，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: "Also, just as space is neither with nor without desire, neither with nor without anger, and neither with nor without delusion, so too is the great vehicle, which is neither with nor without desire, neither with nor without anger, nor with delusion, and which is neither with nor without delusion.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非有初發心可得乃至非有第十發心可得，大乘亦爾，非有初發心可得乃至非有第十發心可得，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Also, just as there's no first arousal of the mind that can be attained in space and no tenth arousal of the mind that can be attained, so too does the great vehicle have no first arousal of the mind that can be attained and no tenth arousal of the mind that can be attained, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equal.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 又如虛空非有淨觀地、種姓地、第八地、具見地、薄地、離欲地、已辦地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地可得，大乘亦爾，非有淨觀地乃至如來地可得，故說大乘與虛空等。
translation: Just as space doesn't have a stage of pure contemplation, a stage of family, an eighth stage, a stage of full view, a thin stage, a stage free of desire, a stage accomplished, a stage of solitary realizers, a stage of bodhisattvas, or a stage of the Tathāgata that can be attained, so too does the great vehicle have a stage of pure contemplation and even a stage of the Tathāgata that can't be attained, so it's said that the great vehicle and space are equal.

source_sentence: 若我乃至見者，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受，若虛空、若大乘、若無量、若無數、若無邊、若一切法，如是一切皆無所有不可得故。
translation: "If I or even those who see, if the sensations that arise from the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind as a condition of contact, if they are empty, if they are great vehicle, if they are immeasurable, if they are countless, if they are limitless, and if they are all dharmas, then they are all without property and cannot be obtained.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 我乃至見者無所有故，當知布施波羅蜜多亦無所有。
translation: Because I and even those who see lack [them], you should know that the perfection of generosity also lacks [them].

source_sentence: 布施波羅蜜多無所有故，當知虛空亦無所有。
translation: Because the perfection of generosity has no existence, you should know that space also has no existence.

source_sentence: 虛空無所有故，當知大乘亦無所有。
translation: Because space has no existence, you should know that the great vehicle also has no existence.

source_sentence: 大乘無所有故，當知無量亦無所有。
translation: Because the great vehicle has nothing, you should know that measurelessness also has nothing.

source_sentence: 無量無所有故，當知無數亦無所有。
translation: Because immeasurable has no existence, you should know that countless has no existence.

source_sentence: 無數無所有故，當知無邊亦無所有。
translation: Because numberlessness has no existence, you should know that limitlessness also has no existence.

source_sentence: 無邊無所有故，當知一切法亦無所有。
translation: Because limitlessness has no existence, you should know that all dharmas are also without existence.

source_sentence: 由此因緣，故說大乘普能容受無量無數無邊有情。
translation: Because of this, it's said that the great vehicle can universally accommodate measureless, countless, and limitless sentient beings.

translation: Because I and even those who see have nothing, you should know that external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, infinite emptiness, dispersed and undispersed emptiness, intrinsic emptiness, emptiness of self and common characteristics, emptiness of all things, inaccessible emptiness, natureless emptiness, self-nature emptiness, and the unfolding of natureless self-nature emptiness also have nothing.

translation: Because the self and even the views of that person lack existence, you should know that the fourfold correct elimination, the four spiritual abilities, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and the eight noble factors of the path in their succession also lack existence.

translation: "If I or even those who see, if the four ways of correctly eliminating or even the eightfold noble path are empty, great, immeasurable, countless, limitless, or all dharmas, then all of them are without existence and cannot be obtained.

source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第四百一十八
